sourcesContent: import NumberInput from '@Components/number-input' import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText, FormGroup } from 'reactstrap' const NumberInputWidth = () => { return ( Width You can control width via utility classes with prop className such as w-50,{' '} w-75, w-100, or use style prop to set the width. ) } export default NumberInputWidth
